Mexican Food Franchise Opportunities Welcome to Franchise Mexican Food Franchise Directory. Entrepreneurs interested in Mexican fast food franchise opportunities can find in-depth details on owning a variety of restaurants focusing on cuisine featuring Burritos, Tacos, Queso and more! Read below to learn more about Mexican and other food Franchise Opportunities and restaurant Business for sale listings!
Didnt find what you were looking for? Check out the rest of the franchises we have available.
Franchises America's Taco Shop® At Americas Taco Shop, we offer a dining experience unlike that of your typical quick-service restaurant. To put it simply, were passionate about good food. Youre not going to find our recipes in a cookbook we use the same recipes that Americas family has perfected in their kitchens for generations. Liquid Capital Required : $90,000 Carl's Jr. With a delicious menu and instant brand recognition, its easy to see why Carls Jr. is known as Americas premier burger chain. We are looking for experienced operators to join our team. By providing world-class training and support, this turn-key opportunity has been designed with your success in mind. Contact us today to learn more! Liquid Capital Required : $500,000 Taco John's Do you dream of owning the hottest restaurant in town? Then Taco Johns is the perfect franchise opportunity! Our extensive training and marketing programs, successful business model and popular menu are second to none! Contact us today and see why were the BOLDEST franchise opportunity around! Liquid Capital Required : $200,000
Articles Related To Mexican Food Franchises:
Moe's Southwest Grill Serves Turkey? March 17, 2011 Not that kind of Turkey, silly. They now have their first restaurant open in Istanbul, Turkey. Master licensee and president and CEO of DOTS Food David Ergisi just opened the new Moe's in popular tourist destination, the Sapphire Towers. The second Turkey location will open in late spring at the Marmara Forum Mall. These are only 2 of the 21 planned locations over the next 5 years. Read more
Kids eat free at hundreds of California restaurants Tuesday September 28, 2010 Families across California are invited to take part in Family Day celebrations, including dining out in one of the hundreds of participating restaurants throughout the state offering free kids meals on Tuesday during the hours of 4 to 8 p.m. Nearly 1,000 restaurants will offer a free kids meals with the purchase of an adult entre (limited to two per table) during the statewide celebration. Read more
Margaritas Mexican Restaurant Named Tops in New England September 15, 2010 Margaritas Mexican Restaurant Named Tops in New England Read more
